name: Nensho Dorako
description:
told Nensho be careful it's can be too dangerous to go all alone and Nensho

accepted the challenge and Nensho goes out and grab his item to explore all alone

to see the whole Neverforest.

Sakura feel worried at Nensho but Takaharu told her about Nensho will be all right on his journey.

Now Nensho is exploring the big part of the Neverforest.

Will Nensho will be the next explorer or not good enough to be the next explorer?

We will find out what is goes to happened on his journey?
